src_original: @#/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/mi mnyam dang mnyam bde chen byang chub che phyogs sum cu rtsha bdun chos/_/rang bzhin lus la gnas pa'i rtsha'i 'khor lo bzhi'i dngos/_/

tgt_original: ཁ་ནི་ཀ་ལིངཀ་རུ་སྨྲ་༎ ལམབའ་ཀ་ནི་མགྲིན་པའི་དབུས་༎ ཚནདོ་ཧ་ཞེས་རྣམ་པར་བཤད་༎ སྙིང་གར་ཀའཉཙིར་བརྗོད་པ་སྟེ་༎ ཆུ་སོ་ཁ་ཡི་གནས་ཉིད་དོ་༎ དེ་ཡང་ཉེ་བའི་ཚནདོ་ཧའོ་༎

src_original: yul de rnams ni thams cad kyang /_/gsung gi 'khor lor yang dag gnas/_/
gnas kyi khyad par tshhul gyis ni/_/sa la rgyu ba rnams zhes bya/_/mtshhan ni pre ta
pu ri ste/_/bshang lam gri ha de ba ta/_/de dag 'du sar rab tu brjod/_/
zhes bya'i ming can yin/_/nye ba'i 'du sa nyid yin te/_/sor mo rnams ni na
ga ra/_/rkang pa'i bol ni sin du ste/_/dur khrod zhes ni bya bar brjod/_/
mthe bong ma rung brjod pa ste/_/pus mo ku lu ta zhes bya/_/de dag nye ba'i
tgt_original: ཉེ་བ་ཡང་ནི་འདུ་བ་ཉིད་༎ སེན་མོ་ན་ག་ར་རུ་དྲན་༎ སིནདྷུ་ངེས་བརྐང་པའི་རྒྱབ་༎ དུར་ཁྲོད་དུ་ནི་ཡང་དག་བརྗོད་༎ མཐེ་བོ་མྱ་ངམ་དུ་རབ་སྨྲ་༎ པུས་མོ་ཀུ་ལུ་ཏའ་རུ་བརྗོད་༎

src_original: dur khrod ste/_/gnas la sogs pa sa bcu'o/_/de dag rang lus las skyes pa/_/
thams cad gnas kyi dbye bas phye/_/phyi dang nang du bcas te gnas/_/sangs
rgyas rnams kyi sa bcu'o/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni/_/nyi shu rtsha
bzhir rnam par phye/_/rtsha rnams thams cad gnas rnams su/_/thams cad du
ni yang dag gnas/_/gnas de rnams kyi mkha' 'gro ma/_/rtsha'i gzugs su yang dag gnas/_/
ba san ta ti la ka las/_gnas la sogs pa'i sa bcu'i yul gyi dbye ba nges par bstan pa ste lnga pa'o//
de nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du son pa'i rtsha'i 'khor lo bstan par bya ste/_snying ga'i dbus gyur pad+ma ni/_/
'dab ma brgyad dang ge sar bcas/_/de'i dbus su gnas pa'i rtsha/_/mar me
lta bu'i gzugs can te/_/chu shing gi ni me tog ltar/_/rtag tu 'phyang zhing
las dang ni/_/bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor spangs par bya/_/bcos ma yis ni
lte bar a'i gzugs kyis ni/_/thung ngu zhes ni bya bar grags/_/snying gar
gnas pa'i yi ge hum/_/ring po cha gnyis tshhad du brjod/_/mgrin par om gyi
gzugs kyis te/_/cha gsum 'dren par yang dag brjod/_/dpral bar
gnas pa'i yi ge ham/_/sgra dang thig le'i mi shigs pa/_/'khor lo bzhi'i bye
brag gis/_/sa stshogs 'byung ba chen po'i/_/'tshhams bzhi ru ni yang dag
bsgom pa dang /_/bcos ma'i bzlas brjod de bzhin te/_/de la sogs pa'i
gnas/_/skad cig bzhi las yang dag byung /_/dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin te/_/sbyor ba bzhi'i pha rol 'gro/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyis ni/_/
bya ba dang ni byed pa'i dngos/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/'dir
ni ji ltar bde bar rol/_/phyogs ni rnam pa bzhir gnas pa'i/_/'dab ma
dag gi rnam pa bzhi/_/'byung ba chen po'i rang bzhin te/_/sems kyi rdo rje'i
go 'phang gnas/_/mkha' 'gro de bzhin la ma dang /_/dum bskyes _ma dang gzugs can ma/_/phyogs mtshhams bzhi la gnas pa'i/_/rtsha ni rnam pa bzhi
dag kyang /_/bdud rtshi lnga ni rgyu ba ste/_/mchod pa'i gzugs kyis de la brten//
rang bzhin bzhi po de dag ni/_/mchod pa bzhi po bya bar bshad/_/'di ni
lus can snying dbus na/_/rtsha brgyad du ni rnam par gnas/_/sku gsung thugs
kyi 'khor lo yis/_/nyi shu rtsha bzhir nye bar brjod/_/gnas sogs sa bcu la
brten nas/_/gnas rnams su ni rnam par gnas/_/mgo bo las ni yang dag
byung /_/rtsha ni mgo las skyes zhes brjod/_/snying stobs rdul dang mun rang bzhin/_/de rnams dbus na gtsho bo yin/_/pu li rar ni rab gtum mo/_/
so dang sen mo 'bab par brjod/_/dza lan d+ha rar gtum mig ma/_/de
bzhin skra dang spu ni 'bab/_/u rgyan zhes bya'i gnas chen du/_/'od ldan ma
ni rnam par bzhugs/_/g.yas kyi gnas su brten te gnas/_/lpags pa dri ma
'dzag pa'o/_/ar bu tar ni sna chen ma/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni sha 'bab pa'o/_/
de ltar brtan pa rnam pa bzhi/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni gnas kyi gtsho/_/gang zhig
rgyus pa 'bab pa'i rtsha/_/go ta ba rir rnam gnas pa/_/dpa' bo'i blo ma zhes
ba'i phyir/_/phyi rol bcos ma rab tu sbyar/_/rang bzhin rtogs par gyur nas
bya ste/_/brtan pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa yin/_/ra me shwa ri rtsha gang yin/_/
ni/_/phyi rol bya ba dgos pa med/_/dper na pha rol don gnyer 'ga'/_/
gzings la brten nas 'gro byed de/_/pha rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed/_/phyi
rol bya byed de bzhin no/_/bcos ma yi ni blo can la/_/las rgyas pa'i rgyud
dag las/_/dngos mchog rig pa'i rgyal ba yis/_/dkyil 'khor la sogs las rnams gang /_/de dag gsal bar ldan mdzad pa/_/thams cad legs
tgt_original: དཀྱིལ་འཁོར་ལ་སོགས་པས་གང་ཞིག་། བཅོས་མའི་བསམ་པས་བྱེད་པ་དག་། ཐམས་ཅད་ལེགས་ཏེ་མི་ལེགས་མིན་༎ དེ་རབ་སྦྱར་བ་གསལ་བ་ཡིན་༎ དེ་རུ་ལས་ནི་རབ་འབད་དེ་༎ དངོས་མཆོག་རིག་པའི་རྒྱལ་བ་ཡིས་༎

src_original: de nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rtsha rnams kyi 'khor lo
byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsha bdun gyi rnam par dag pa bshad par bya ste/
lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/tshhor ba dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa ni la ma'o/_/chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o/_/ sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o/_/'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa ni/_rab gtum ma'o/_/brtshon 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum mig ma'o/_/dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o/_/sems kyi rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o/_/dad pa'i dbang po ni dpa' bo'i blo ma'o/_/
brtshon 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o/_/dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ga'i dbang phyug ma'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o/_/shes rab
kyi dbang po ni sa srungs ma'o/_/dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o/_/
brtshon 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung shugs ma'o/_/dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o//
ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs ma'o/_/shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta sna ma'o/_/
brtshon 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o/_/dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/_/shin tu sbyangs pa
dang legs min gzung /_/ji ltar sgra rnams shes bya'i phyir/_/de'i bstan bcos drang srong byas/_/las kyi rjes 'gro skyes bu yis/_/phyi rol bya byed de
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o/_/chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni glang sna ma'o/_/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/_/btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/
shin tu dpa' mo'o/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o/_/yang dag
pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los sgyur ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i ngag ni brtshon 'grus
'grus chen mo'o/_/yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khwa gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i 'tshho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i rtshol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o/_/
yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni
dpal he ru ka'o/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa ni/_gshin rje
brtan ma'o/_/dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams srung zhing spel ba ni/_gshin rje pho
nya ma'o/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba ni/_gshin rje mche ba ma'o/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni gshin rje
'joms ma ste 'di dag ni lus la gnas pa'i rtsha dang zhal dang phyag dang mdog dang /_dbyibs la sogs pa'i lha rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsha
bdun gyis sbyangs pa'o/_/ ba san ta ti la ka las/_rtsha'i 'khor lo byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsha bdun gyi rnam par dag pa nges par bstan pa ste/_bdun pa'o//_//

de nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_mchod sbyin dang /_bzlas brjod dang /_bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i bya ba rnams/_phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i tshhul gyis rnam par dag pa
bshad par bya ste/_byang chub che phyogs chos rnams ni/_/sum cu rtsha bdun

brjod/_/de'i dbus su yi ge ham/_/thig le'i gzugs can mi shig pa/_/mi

cad ni/_/rnam par thar par mi 'gyur zhing /_/mchog tu nyon mongs rgyu ru
kun gyi gzugs rnams ni/_/dang por de las skyes pa yin/_/bdud rtshi 'dzag
pa'i tshhul gyis ni/_/nyin dang mtshhan du rnam par gnas/_/de nyid kyis ni sgra
yang phye/_/me ni mnyes par byed pa yin/_/des ni dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs
par/_/'gyur ba nyid du the tshhom med/_/de nyid dkyil 'khor zhes bshad de/

lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'dod/_/rtsha chen sum cu rtsha gnyis kyis/_/'khor

ba san ta ti la ka las/_dkyil 'khor dang /_sbyin sreg dang mchod sbyin dang /_bzlas brjod dang /_bsgom pa la sogs pa'i gtan la dbab pa nges par bstan pa ste brgyad pa'o//_//

rnam par bshad par bya ste/_gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba/_/rdo rje

dbus su rnam gnas pa'i/_/pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu gnyis/_/mgrin par gnas pa'i pad+ma yang /_/'dab ma bcu drug dag tu gyes/_/de bzhin snying ga'i pad+ma ni/_/'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa yin/_/drug cu rtsha bzhi 'dab

tgt_original: གང་ཚེ་ལོངས་སྤྱོད་རྫོགས་པའི་སྐུ་༎ ནུབ་པར་གྱུར་པ་དེ་ཡི་ཚེ་༎ བྷ་གའི་ནང་དུ་ཕྱིན་དེ་ཡང་༎ ཡུངས་ཀར་ཙམ་དུ་རྣམ་བརྗོད་པ་༎ ཉི་མའི་གཟུགས་སུ་ཡང་དག་བཤད་༎ སྤྲུལ་པའི་སྐུར་ནི་བརྗོད་པ་སྟེ་༎

src_original: dag gnas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/de yis bskyed
sna rtshe dang /_/gang tshhe rdo rje rtsher gnas pa/_/'di ni b+ha ga'i dbus gyur pa'i/_/ nyungs dkar zhes ni bya bar brjod/_/pad+ma gar dbang rgyal ba yis/_/pad+ma
'byed pa'i sbyor bas ni/_/de nas nyi ma nub 'gyur ba/_/sprul pa'i sku yi rang
'khor ba'i lam ni gcod pa po/_/spros pa nyer zhi dge ba dang /_/gnyis med
nyid kyis ni 'joms zhes bya/_/rnal ma'i lam la brten nas ni/_/thams cad
mchog tu dga' ba yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin dang /_/dpal ldan
gyis su/_/rgyud ni rnam pa gsum du gnas/_/'dod chags nyid dang chags
bral ni/_/zos nas srin bu gnyid du gnas/_/rtsha rnams thams cad mnyam
sbyor ba/_/mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom/_/gsang ba sa'i khams zhes bya/_/de
bzhin mchog ni chu yin te/_/dgyes pa me zhes bya bar bshad/_/thams cad
bdag nyid rlung yin te/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba'i mchog_/rtag tu
bzhugs zhes bya bar gsungs/_/yang na me long rang bzhin dang /_/de bzhin
mnyam pa nyid dang ni/_/so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /_/de bzhin bya ba grub
rnams te/_/shin tu rnam dag rang bzhin ni/_/rtag tu bzhugs zhes bya bar
byas kyang rnam par grol/_/
bshad/_/yang na rnam par snang mdzad dang /_/de bzhin rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_/'od dpag med dang don grub dang /_/rtag tu bzhugs pa rdo
rje sems/_/bdud rtshi lnga dngos gong bu ni/_/thig le'i gzugs can yid kyi
dngos/_/shin tu rnam dag ye shes che/_/lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin no/_/rdo
rje sems dpa' zhes brjod pa/_/mchog tu bde ba yang dag brjod/_/rang
'byung gi ni ye shes te/_/chos kyi sku zhes bya bar grags/_/'di ni shes rab
lhan skyes gnas/_/der 'gro ma'i gzugs 'dzin ma/_/las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su/_/lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas ni 'bar/_/phag mo zhes ni bya ba
ste/_/ba san ti la ka zhes brjod/_/skra rtshe stong gi tshhad tsham ste/_/'od zer
glog stong 'khyug pa bzhin/_/lha'i rnal 'byor dus su ni/_/ba spu'i bu ga'i

ba san ta ti la ka las/_bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor dang sbyin bsreg dang /_mchod sbyin dang /_bzlas brjod dang /_bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang /_gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po las mngon par zhen pa'i
mtshhams rnams su/_/byung ste phyogs bcur gnas pa'i/_/lha dang lha min
sdigs par mdzad/_/snying gar chos kyi 'khor lo ni/_/bsregs nas longs
spyod gnas song ste/_/sna phug g.yas kyi bu ga nas/_/byung ste g.yon du song
nas kyang /_/smin 'tshhams mdzod spu nas byung ste/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang sems kyi/_/shangs sgo g.yon du zhugs nas ni/_/spyi gtshug 'khor lo
bsregs nas ni/_/slar byung sngon gsungs sgo nas ni/_/slar yang mgo bo'i
dbus zhugs nas/_/bsregs pa'i sangs rgyas dag bskyed do/_/lte ba'i
gnas su 'ongs gyur nas/_/sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur/_/

ba san ta ti la ka las/_chos dang /_longs spyod dang /_sprul pa dang /_bde ba chen po la zhen pa sngon du 'gro ba'i ba san ta zhes bya ba dpal he ru ka dang /_ti la ka zhes bya ba'i rdo rje phag mor brjod pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
ma bcu gnyis dang gsal byed sum cu rtsha bzhis rnam par brgyan/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbye bas phye ba gnas pa'i gnas la stshogs/_/sa'i dbang

de nas gzhan yang mdor bstan pa dang /_rgyas par bstan pa la sogs pa'i tshhul du gsungs pa'i rgyud kyi bdag nyid/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin/_lus can rnams kyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du lha'i rang bzhin du bstan par bya ste/_gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/_/tshhor
ba rdo rje nyi ma ni/_/'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug_/'du byed rdo rje rgyal po'o//
rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/thams cad rang bzhin he ru ka_/'dren
byed rdo rje gti mug ste/_/nyan byed zhe sdang rdo rjer brjod/_/snom pa phrag dog
rdo rjer brjod/_/lce ni 'dod chags rdo rjer brjod/_/lus ni ser sna rdo rje'o/_/
de dag sbom po'i lha lnga yin/_/skye mched khams rnams thams cad ni/_/dbang
phyug che mchog he ru ka_/sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma/_/chu'i khams ni gsod
byed brjod/_/me'i khams ni 'gugs byed ma/_/rlung ni gar gyi dbang phyug
brjod/_/rab tu brtan pa nam mkha'i khams/_/pad+ma'i dra ba can du bstan/
'di ni lus can rnams kyi lus/_/phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid/_/bde
dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las/_/nyon mongs la sogs skye ba nyid/_/skye dang 'jig pa la brten nas/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das thob pa'o//
phyug kun 'gro kun snying nam mkha'i dbus gyur mchog zhi ba/_/he ru ka dpal
'byung ba nyid/_/rab tu gyur pa'i sgo zhes bshad/_/tsho bo mchog gi sgo yin te/
'og dang steng zhes rab tu grags/_/'og sgo rnam par shes pa ste/_/steng gi sgo
ru khams rnams so/_/rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams/_/'og tu yang
mchog tu mya ngan 'das pa de nyid dngos/_/ba san ti la ka spros rab gsal nye
dag gnas nas su/_//de rnams steng gi sgo nas bskyod/_/'og tu spyan drangs san ba san ta ti la ka zhes bya ba/
steng gshegs gsol/_/spyan drangs gshegs gsol tshhul gyis ni/_/'gro dang 'ong bar rab tu 'jug_/dus gsum gyi ni sangs rgyas dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma
dang sbyor ba'i ma/_/'jug pa dang ni ldog pa las/_/yon tan skyon gyi rang bzhin te/_/bde dang sdug bsngal ngo bo nyid/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin

'grub/_/_// ba san ta ti la ka las/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sgo rnams kyi dbye ba nges par bstan pa ste gsum pa'o//_// de nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gnas la sogs pa sa
bcu'i gnas bstan par bya ste/_bu ga dgu'i rtsha rnams gang /_/sgo dgu ru ni
yang dag gnas/_/de las gzhan ni shin tu gtsho/_/bcu pa b+ha ga'i dbus su'o//
dpral ba'i gnas nas brtshams nas su/_/ham ni rtsha'i 'khor lor nges/_/
byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis/_/nyin dang mtshhan du 'dzag par brjod/_/
gnas sogs kyi rang bzhin du/_/phyi dang nang du bcas par gnas/_/rnal
'byor ma brgyad mkha' la rgyu/_/de bzhin gzhan yang sa la rgyu/_/gang zhig sa
'og gnas pa dag_/thams cad du ni shin tu gnas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi
'khor lo yis/_/gnas ni so sor dbye bar bya/_/gnas la sogs pa rnam pa
bcu/_/rtsha ni nyi shu rtsha bzhir dbye/_/ji ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/
lhan cig skyes pas mnan te bzhugs/_/de ltar yang dag bshad de dag_/
rab tu dga' la sogs pa'i sa/_/dbang po la sogs rang bzhin gyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/_/phung po la sogs khyad par gyis/_/sangs
rgyas rnams ni kun gyi gnas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/
sangs rgyas nyid du 'jug pa'i mchog_/byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis/_/
gang tshhe 'dir ni yongs gang ba/_/de tshhe sangs rgyas sras bcas rnams/_/nye
bar sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/_/rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bzhugs/
gzhan du gang na'ang sangs rgyas med/_/mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa rnams/_/
sa dag yin te/_/de bzhin du ni 'du sa dang /_/nye ba'i ni 'du sa'o/_/ dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de/_/gnas sogs sa ni rnam bcu yin//_/
